metadata.reset:
RESETTING YOUR Z-WAVE NETWORK
In order to factory reset your Z-Wave network,
navigate to the Z-Wave Utilities page under Settings.
Select “Z-Wave Reset Controller”
After a few seconds, the LifeShield base will beep to indicate that your Z-Wave network has been reset. Any devices which were part of your Z-Wave network will need to be reset before they can be re-added. Use the Z-Wave General Exclusion menu under Z-Wave Utilities to do this.

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
